oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studies in Vaccine Induced Cell-Mediated Immunity in Cattle: The Challenge
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Compton, Bob
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: modified live vaccines
killed vaccines
cell-mediated immunity
lymphocytic memory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The concept that modified live vaccines and not killed vaccines will produce cell-mediated immunity and significant lymphocytic memory has long been held as scientific fact in veterinary immunology. However, evidence has been accumulating which indicates this concept is not necessarily true in all cases.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 193
